Services

Spending far too much time checking and answering emails , organising appointments, returning calls, chasing invoices etc?
Below is a list of just some of the services I can offer.

What Services I Offer

As a Virtual Assistant, I can help you with everything from administrative assistance to website design and creation, bookkeeping, data entry and the list goes on and on...

Everything you would expect from an in-house administrative assistant, and most times a whole lot more.

I have listed some of the services that I am able to offer you to free up your time. If there is a service you require and it is not listed below please feel free to contact me to discuss further.

Administrative Tasks

  • Create, edit , populate Excel and Word Documents
  • Data Entry & Formatting
  • Email Inbox Management
  • Diary Management
  • Gmail set-up and training
  • File management setup and organisation - Google Drive, Dropbox etc
  • Social Media Management
  • Website Creation
  • Up date Website content
  • Customer Support - Answer enquiries, complaints etc
  • General Book-keeping
  • Accounts Payable & Accounts Receivable
  • Create Invoices & Purchase Orders
  • Stationery / Supplies ordering
  • and anything else you can think of !

Information Technology

  • User Acceptance Testing - (UAT)
  • Beta Testing
  • Test Plans
  • Systems Training
  • User Manuals & Documentation

Lifestyle Management

  • Travel & Accommodation Bookings
  • Appointment Bookings (dental etc)
  • Make calls - save you waitiing on hold
  • Gift Purchases
  • Gift Wrapping
  • House checks (Mail collection, mail scan/email, water plants etc)
